leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 物理仿真-CFD 求解器与湍流生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 网格→求解→模型→后处理→验证→UQ

queries: [WEB] high performance computing CFD tools github

tools.name: LB-t
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-threaded object-oriented CFD code using Lattice Boltzmann Method
tools.detailed_description: A multi-threaded object-oriented computational fluid dynamics (CFD) solver for three-dimensional incompressible fluid flow. It utilizes the incompressible lattice-Boltzmann method (LBM) on regular grids, supporting general lattices (D2Q9, D3Q15, etc.) and is implemented in C++17 with OpenMP parallelization.

tools.name: ACCESS-OM2
tools.one_line_profile: Global coupled ocean-sea ice model configuration for climate research
tools.detailed_description: The ACCESS-OM2 is a global coupled ocean-sea ice model developed by the Australian Community Climate and Earth System Simulator (ACCESS). It serves as a key component for climate modeling and oceanographic research.

tools.name: Castro
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive mesh compressible astrophysics radiation-hydrodynamics solver
tools.detailed_description: Castro is an adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) code for astrophysical compressible hydrodynamics, radiation-hydrodynamics, and magneto-hydrodynamics simulations. It supports massively parallel architectures (CPU and GPU) using the AMReX framework.

tools.name: MAESTROeX
tools.one_line_profile: Low Mach number stellar hydrodynamics simulation code
tools.detailed_description: MAESTROeX is a C++ code based on AMReX for simulating low Mach number stellar hydrodynamics. It is designed for modeling long-time evolution of astrophysical flows where sound waves can be filtered out.

tools.name: Microphysics
tools.one_line_profile: Astrophysical microphysics routines for AMReX-based codes
tools.detailed_description: A collection of common astrophysical microphysics routines (nuclear networks, equations of state, opacity) designed with interfaces for integration into various AMReX-based simulation codes like Castro and MAESTROeX.

tools.name: Nyx
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive mesh N-body hydro cosmological simulation code
tools.detailed_description: Nyx is a massively parallel, adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) code for cosmological simulations. It solves equations for N-body dark matter and compressible hydrodynamics of baryonic gas to model the evolution of the universe.

tools.name: Amrvis
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization package for AMReX-based simulation data
tools.detailed_description: Amrvis is a specialized visualization tool designed to read, display, and analyze output and profiling data from scientific simulation codes built on the AMReX framework.

tools.name: AMReX
tools.one_line_profile: Software framework for block-structured adaptive mesh refinement
tools.detailed_description: AMReX is a software framework designed for building massively parallel, block-structured adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) applications. It supports solving systems of partial differential equations on hierarchical grids with GPU acceleration.

tools.name: pyamrex
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-enabled zero-copy Python bindings for AMReX
tools.detailed_description: pyamrex provides Python bindings for the AMReX framework, enabling zero-copy data exchange between C++ AMReX kernels and Python environments. It facilitates the integration of AI/ML workflows with high-performance AMR simulations.

tools.name: PeleAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Processing tools for reacting flow simulations with AMReX
tools.detailed_description: A collection of post-processing and analysis tools specifically designed for reacting flow simulations generated by AMReX-based CFD codes (Pele suite).

tools.name: PeleC
tools.one_line_profile: AMR code for compressible reacting flow simulations
tools.detailed_description: PeleC is an adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) solver for compressible reacting flows. It is part of the Pele suite and is designed for high-performance combustion simulations on modern supercomputers.

tools.name: PeleLMeX
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive mesh solver for low Mach number reacting flows
tools.detailed_description: PeleLMeX is an adaptive mesh hydrodynamics simulation code for low Mach number reacting flows. It is an evolution of PeleLM, offering improved performance and scalability for combustion research.

tools.name: PeleMP
tools.one_line_profile: Multiphysics models for the Pele combustion suite
tools.detailed_description: PeleMP provides multiphysics models (such as spray and soot models) for use with the Pele suite of combustion codes (PeleC, PeleLMeX).

tools.name: PelePhysics
tools.one_line_profile: Physics databases and routines for combustion simulations
tools.detailed_description: PelePhysics is a library containing physics databases (thermodynamics, transport, chemistry) and implementation code shared across the Pele suite of combustion solvers.

tools.name: FHDeX
tools.one_line_profile: Stochastic hybrid models and algorithms for fluctuating hydrodynamics
tools.detailed_description: FHDeX provides AMReX-enabled code libraries for stochastic hybrid models and algorithms for fluids, specifically focusing on fluctuating hydrodynamics.

tools.name: LBMeX
tools.one_line_profile: Lattice Boltzmann methods implementation on AMReX
tools.detailed_description: LBMeX implements Lattice Boltzmann methods (LBM) using the AMReX software framework, enabling scalable parallel simulations of fluid flows on structured grids.

tools.name: AMReX-Hydro
tools.one_line_profile: Hydrodynamic routines for AMReX-based applications
tools.detailed_description: AMReX-Hydro is a collection of hydrodynamic routines and solvers built on the AMReX framework, providing reusable components for fluid dynamics simulations.

tools.name: IAMR
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel AMR solver for variable-density incompressible Navier-Stokes
tools.detailed_description: IAMR is a parallel, adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) code that solves the variable-density incompressible Navier-Stokes equations, suitable for modeling diverse fluid flow problems.

tools.name: incflo
tools.one_line_profile: Incompressible Navier-Stokes solver for complex geometries
tools.detailed_description: incflo is an incompressible Navier-Stokes solver built on AMReX, designed to handle complex geometries and embedded boundaries for fluid flow simulations.

tools.name: ELEQTRONeX
tools.one_line_profile: Electrostatic-Quantum Transport framework for modeling FETs
tools.detailed_description: ELEQTRONeX is a simulation framework based on the nonequilibrium Green's function (NEGF) method for modeling electrostatic-quantum transport in field-effect transistors (FETs).

tools.name: FerroX
tools.one_line_profile: 3D phase-field simulation framework for ferroelectric materials
tools.detailed_description: FerroX is a massively parallel, 3D phase-field simulation framework designed for modeling ferroelectric materials and scalable logic devices using AMReX.

tools.name: artemis
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive mesh electrodynamics solver for quantum materials
tools.detailed_description: ARTEMIS couples Maxwell's equations solvers with classical equations for quantum material behavior (e.g., micromagnetics, superconductivity) to quantify the performance of next-generation microelectronics.

tools.name: DLBFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic load balancing library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: DLBFoam is an open-source library that provides dynamic load balancing capabilities for fast reacting flow simulations in OpenFOAM, improving parallel efficiency in cases with localized computational loads.

tools.name: flowtorch
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for analysis and reduced-order modeling of fluid flows
tools.detailed_description: flowTorch is a Python library designed for the analysis and reduced-order modeling (ROM) of fluid flow data. It leverages PyTorch to integrate machine learning techniques with fluid dynamics analysis.

tools.name: Omega3D
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated 3D vortex methods solver with GUI
tools.detailed_description: Omega3D is a GPU-accelerated computational fluid dynamics solver based on 3D vortex methods. It includes a graphical user interface (GUI) for ease of use and is developed by Applied Scientific Research.

tools.name: ImpactX
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance beam dynamics modeling code
tools.detailed_description: ImpactX is a code for the high-performance modeling of beam dynamics in particle accelerators. It accounts for collective effects and is designed to run efficiently on modern supercomputing architectures.

tools.name: WarpX
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced electromagnetic Particle-In-Cell code
tools.detailed_description: WarpX is an advanced electromagnetic Particle-In-Cell (PIC) code designed for simulating laser-plasma interactions and particle accelerators on exascale supercomputers.

tools.name: HPK
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for running Kubernetes applications on HPC Slurm clusters
tools.detailed_description: HPK (High Performance Kubernetes) allows users to run Kubernetes-native applications within HPC environments by translating deployments to Slurm jobs and Singularity/Apptainer containers, bridging cloud-native and HPC workflows.

tools.name: VISCOPLASTIC-LBM
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated LBM solver for viscoplastic flows
tools.detailed_description: A Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) software designed for simulating viscoplastic fluid flows, leveraging GPU acceleration (CUDA) for high performance.

tools.name: TCLB
tools.one_line_profile: Templated MPI+CUDA/CPU Lattice Boltzmann code
tools.detailed_description: TCLB is a high-performance Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) code that uses C++ templates for efficient code generation on both CPU and GPU architectures, supporting MPI for multi-node parallelism.

tools.name: CaNS
tools.one_line_profile: Massively-parallel DNS code for canonical flows
tools.detailed_description: CaNS is a code designed for fast, massively-parallel direct numerical simulations (DNS) of canonical fluid flows (e.g., channel flow, duct flow) using FFT-based solvers.

tools.name: Tsunamis.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Shallow Water Equations Solver in Julia
tools.detailed_description: Tsunamis.jl is a Julia-based solver for the Shallow Water Equations using the Finite Volume Method and HLLE Riemann Solver, designed for simulating tsunami propagation and related phenomena.

tools.name: sdfibm
tools.one_line_profile: Immersed boundary method solver using signed distance fields
tools.detailed_description: sdfibm implements an immersed boundary method (IBM) empowered by signed distance fields (SDF) within the OpenFOAM framework, enabling simulations of flows around complex geometries.

tools.name: OpenCFDinCUDA
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated 2D fluid simulation solver using Finite Volume Method
tools.detailed_description: A 2D fluid simulation program implementing the finite volume method on structured meshes, accelerated using CUDA for GPU performance.

tools.name: cotainr
tools.one_line_profile: User-space Apptainer/Singularity container builder for HPC
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to build Apptainer/Singularity containers in user space, facilitating the deployment of scientific software in HPC environments.

tools.name: pde-dataset-generator
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for PDE ground truth datasets from standard solvers
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) ground truth datasets using established solvers like ARCSim, FEniCS, and SU2, designed for ML-based physics modeling.

tools.name: E4S
tools.one_line_profile: Extreme-scale Scientific Software Stack integration for Spack
tools.detailed_description: The Extreme-scale Scientific Software Stack (E4S) project repository for Spack integration, providing a curated collection of open-source software packages for HPC.

tools.name: E4S à la carte
tools.one_line_profile: Custom container image builder for the E4S ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: A tool that allows users to customize container images by adding system and Spack packages, tailored for the Extreme-scale Scientific Software Stack (E4S).

tools.name: E4S Container Launcher
tools.one_line_profile: Container manager optimized for E4S HPC workflows
tools.detailed_description: A tool to manage and launch containers for the E4S project, simplifying the use of containerized scientific applications on HPC systems.

tools.name: HELYX-OS
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source GUI for OpenFOAM CFD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for OpenFOAM, designed to facilitate the setup and execution of CFD simulations.

tools.name: CarpetX
tools.one_line_profile: AMReX-based driver for the Einstein Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A driver for the Einstein Toolkit based on the AMReX framework, enabling adaptive mesh refinement for relativistic astrophysics simulations.

tools.name: pyfra
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for research experiment automation
tools.detailed_description: A research framework designed to simplify the orchestration of experiments, including remote execution, file syncing, and environment management for scientific research.

tools.name: AMR-Wind
tools.one_line_profile: Massively parallel, block-structured adaptive mesh incompressible flow solver
tools.detailed_description: An AMReX-based structured wind solver for exascale simulations of atmospheric boundary layer flows and wind farm aerodynamics.

tools.name: hybridPorousInterFoam
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM solver for hybrid-scale porous media flows
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM solver designed for performing single- and two-phase flow simulations on hybrid-scale porous media.

tools.name: GPUSPH
tools.one_line_profile: CUDA-based Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH) solver
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Weakly-Compressible Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH) accelerated with CUDA, designed for free-surface flow simulations.

tools.name: PyFrac
tools.one_line_profile: Planar 3D hydraulic fracture growth solver
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based solver for simulating planar 3D hydraulic fracture growth, developed by the Geo-Energy Laboratory at EPFL.

tools.name: dynamite
tools.one_line_profile: Fast quantum evolution and eigensolving using PETSc/SLEPc
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fast quantum dynamics evolution and eigensolving utilizing Krylov subspace methods via the PETSc and SLEPc libraries.

tools.name: cuFSDAF
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated FSDAF algorithm for remote sensing data fusion
tools.detailed_description: A CUDA-parallelized implementation of the Flexible Spatiotemporal Data Fusion (FSDAF) algorithm, featuring adaptive domain decomposition for high-performance remote sensing data processing.

tools.name: NTUSTCFDLAB
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Finite Volume Method CFD solver with OpenMP/MPI
tools.detailed_description: A 3D CFD solver based on the Finite Volume Method, implemented with hybrid OpenMP/MPI parallelization for fluid dynamics simulations.

tools.name: HiPACE
tools.one_line_profile: Highly efficient Plasma Accelerator Emulation code
tools.detailed_description: A quasistatic particle-in-cell (PIC) code designed for highly efficient emulation of plasma accelerators.

tools.name: ITHACA-FV
tools.one_line_profile: Reduced Order Modelling (ROM) implementation for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Reduced Order Modelling techniques specifically for OpenFOAM, enabling faster simulation times for parameterized CFD problems.

tools.name: CompGrids.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Computational grid generation for Julia scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for creating computational grids compatible with ParallelStencil.jl and PETSc.jl, facilitating numerical simulations.

tools.name: PETSc.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrappers for the PETSc scientific library
tools.detailed_description: The Julia interface to PETSc (Portable, Extensible Toolkit for Scientific Computation), enabling high-performance scientific computing within the Julia ecosystem.

tools.name: KTH_Framework
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox framework for Nek5000 CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: A framework for developing and managing toolboxes and extensions for the Nek5000 spectral element CFD solver, maintained by KTH.

tools.name: uberenv
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Spack-based software deployment tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by LLNL to automate the use of Spack for building and deploying complex scientific software stacks.

tools.name: MFC
tools.one_line_profile: Exascale simulation of multiphase fluid dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance computational fluid dynamics code for exascale simulation of multiphase and multi-physics flows.

tools.name: Mallard
tools.one_line_profile: Unstructured, GPU accelerated, high-order finite volume CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: Mallard is a high-order finite volume Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) solver designed for unstructured grids. It leverages GPU acceleration to perform efficient simulations of fluid flows.

tools.name: ngmo-environments
tools.one_line_profile: Configuration environments for Met Office's Next Generation Modelling
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the environment definitions and configurations required for the Next Generation Modelling for Momentum (NG-Mom) project at the Met Office, likely utilizing Spack or container technologies for reproducibility.

tools.name: wuFoil
tools.one_line_profile: Airfoil modelling, meshing, analysis, and optimization tool
tools.detailed_description: wuFoil is an integrated tool for airfoil design and analysis. It combines modelling, meshing, and optimization capabilities, providing interfaces to external solvers like SU2 and XFoil, and meshers like Gmsh.

tools.name: strugepic
tools.one_line_profile: Structure preserving symplectic PIC simulation code
tools.detailed_description: Strugepic is a Particle-in-Cell (PIC) simulation code that implements structure-preserving symplectic algorithms. It is built upon the AMReX framework for adaptive mesh refinement and parallel computing.

tools.name: DrivAerNet
tools.one_line_profile: Large-Scale Multimodal Car Dataset with CFD Simulations
tools.detailed_description: DrivAerNet is a large-scale dataset designed for data-driven aerodynamic design. It includes computational fluid dynamics (CFD) simulation data and deep learning benchmarks for automotive aerodynamics.

tools.name: molssi-hub
tools.one_line_profile: Container Hub for Computational Molecular Science
tools.detailed_description: The MolSSI Container Hub provides a centralized repository and tools for accessing and managing containers for computational molecular science software, facilitating reproducible research.

tools.name: MHIT36
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-GPU code for interface-resolved multiphase turbulence simulations
tools.detailed_description: MHIT36 is a Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) code for multiphase turbulence. It uses a phase-field method for interface description and is optimized for multi-GPU execution using the cuDecomp library.

tools.name: ngs-petsc
tools.one_line_profile: Interface between NGSolve and PETSc
tools.detailed_description: ngs-petsc is a library that provides an interface between the NGSolve finite element library and the PETSc toolkit for scientific computation, enabling the use of PETSc solvers within NGSolve.

tools.name: marbles
tools.one_line_profile: Lattice Boltzmann method solver with adaptive mesh refinement
tools.detailed_description: Marbles is a fluid dynamics solver based on the Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM). It features adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) to efficiently resolve multi-scale flow features.

tools.name: Nalu
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized unstructured massively parallel low Mach flow solver
tools.detailed_description: Nalu is a massively parallel, unstructured grid CFD code designed for low Mach number flows. It is built on the Sierra Toolkit and Trilinos solver stack, suitable for a variety of open engineering applications.

tools.name: SimpleNSSolver
tools.one_line_profile: Massively-parallelized Navier-Stokes solver
tools.detailed_description: SimpleNSSolver is a validated and documented Navier-Stokes solver designed for massive parallelism, suitable for fundamental fluid dynamics research.

tools.name: SimpleTCSolver
tools.one_line_profile: Massively-parallelized solver for Taylor-Couette flows
tools.detailed_description: SimpleTCSolver is a specialized Navier-Stokes solver optimized for simulating Taylor-Couette flows in a massively parallel computing environment.

tools.name: SimpleVOFSolver
tools.one_line_profile: Massively-parallelized VOF solver for droplet-laden flows
tools.detailed_description: SimpleVOFSolver implements the Volume-of-Fluid (VOF) method within a Navier-Stokes solver to simulate droplet-laden flows on massively parallel systems.

tools.name: Nek5000
tools.one_line_profile: High-fidelity spectral element CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: Nek5000 is a spectral element method (SEM) code for the simulation of unsteady incompressible fluid flow with heat transfer, moving meshes, and other physics. It is known for its high order accuracy and scalability.

tools.name: NekROM
tools.one_line_profile: Model-Order Reduction Framework for Nek5000
tools.detailed_description: NekROM is a framework designed to perform Model-Order Reduction (MOR) specifically for the Nek5000 CFD solver, enabling faster simulations through reduced order modeling.

tools.name: Nekbone
tools.one_line_profile: Proxy app for Nek5000 performance benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: Nekbone is a mini-app or proxy application derived from Nek5000. It captures the essential computational kernel of the full solver to facilitate performance analysis and benchmarking on HPC systems.

tools.name: nekRS
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated spectral element CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: nekRS is the next-generation version of Nek5000, designed from the ground up for GPU acceleration using OCCA. It retains the spectral element method's accuracy while leveraging modern heterogeneous architectures.

tools.name: NekBox
tools.one_line_profile: Box-geometry prototyping version of Nek5000
tools.detailed_description: NekBox is a specialized version of the Nek5000 code focused on box geometries. It serves as a prototyping tool for testing new algorithms and features in a simplified geometric context.

tools.name: VERTEX-CFD
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-physics solver for fusion applications
tools.detailed_description: VERTEX-CFD is a multi-physics computational fluid dynamics solver specifically developed for nuclear fusion applications, handling the complex physics requirements of fusion reactor simulations.

tools.name: CFD-and-Blood-Damage-Benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark data for CFD and blood damage validation
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains benchmark datasets and validation studies for Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) applied to blood damage modeling, sponsored by the FDA.

tools.name: CFD_Solver_2D_GPU
tools.one_line_profile: 2D Unstructured-Grid CFD Solver Based on GPU
tools.detailed_description: A 2D Computational Fluid Dynamics solver that utilizes GPU acceleration for unstructured grids, designed for educational or research purposes in accelerating flow simulations.

tools.name: OpenCFD-SCU
tools.one_line_profile: GPU High precision finite difference CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: OpenCFD-SCU is a high-precision finite difference CFD solver optimized for GPU architectures, developed for efficient simulation of fluid flows.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-1.7.x
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source CFD Toolbox (Version 1.7.x)
tools.detailed_description: OpenFOAM 1.7.x is a legacy version of the comprehensive open-source CFD toolbox, providing solvers and utilities for a wide range of fluid dynamics problems.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-10
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source CFD Toolbox (Version 10)
tools.detailed_description: OpenFOAM Version 10 is a major release of the open-source CFD toolbox, featuring updated solvers, physical models, and improved performance for fluid dynamics simulations.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-2.2.x
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source CFD Toolbox (Version 2.2.x)
tools.detailed_description: OpenFOAM 2.2.x is a patch version of the OpenFOAM 2.2 release, providing bug fixes and stability improvements for this specific branch of the CFD toolbox.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-2.3.x
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source CFD Toolbox (Version 2.3.x)
tools.detailed_description: OpenFOAM 2.3.x is a patch version of the OpenFOAM 2.3 release, maintaining the capabilities of the 2.3 series for CFD simulations.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-4.x
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source CFD Toolbox (Version 4.x)
tools.detailed_description: OpenFOAM 4.x is a patch version of the OpenFOAM 4 release, offering a stable environment for CFD simulations with the features introduced in version 4.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-5.x
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source CFD Toolbox (Version 5.x)
tools.detailed_description: OpenFOAM 5.x is a patch version of the OpenFOAM 5 release, continuing the development and maintenance of the version 5 branch.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-6
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source CFD Toolbox (Version 6)
tools.detailed_description: OpenFOAM Version 6 is a major release providing an extensive set of solvers and libraries for continuum mechanics, primarily CFD.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-7
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source CFD Toolbox (Version 7)
tools.detailed_description: OpenFOAM Version 7 is a major release of the standard open-source CFD library, including new features and improvements over previous versions.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-8
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source CFD Toolbox (Version 8)
tools.detailed_description: OpenFOAM Version 8 is a major release offering the latest advancements in open-source CFD capabilities from the OpenFOAM Foundation.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-9
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source CFD Toolbox (Version 9)
tools.detailed_description: OpenFOAM Version 9 is a major release providing robust and extensible solvers for complex fluid flow problems.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-dev
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM Development Repository
tools.detailed_description: This is the development repository for OpenFOAM, containing the latest code changes, features, and experimental solvers before they are released in stable versions.

tools.name: su2fmt
tools.one_line_profile: SU2 mesh format parser and visualizer
tools.detailed_description: su2fmt is a utility tool for parsing and visualizing mesh files in the SU2 format, aiding in the pre-processing and inspection of CFD meshes.

tools.name: phasta
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Hierarchic Adaptive Stabilized Transient Analysis solver
tools.detailed_description: PHASTA is a parallel, adaptive, stabilized finite element flow solver for compressible and incompressible Navier-Stokes equations, suitable for transient analysis.

tools.name: LBDEMcoupling-public
tools.one_line_profile: Coupling between Palabos (LBM) and LIGGGHTS (DEM)
tools.detailed_description: This tool provides a coupling interface between the Lattice-Boltzmann code Palabos and the Discrete Element Method code LIGGGHTS, enabling resolved simulations of particulate flows.

tools.name: Palabos-PFM
tools.one_line_profile: Palabos with Phase Field Method addons
tools.detailed_description: Palabos-PFM extends the Palabos Lattice Boltzmann solver with Phase Field Method (PFM) capabilities for simulating multiphase flows with interface tracking.

tools.name: pawsey-spack-config
tools.one_line_profile: Spack configuration for Pawsey Supercomputing Centre
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the Spack configuration files and recipes used to deploy the scientific software stack at the Pawsey Supercomputing Centre, facilitating reproducible HPC environments.

tools.name: phasicFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel DEM and CFD-DEM simulation code
tools.detailed_description: phasicFlow is a highly efficient, parallel code designed for Discrete Element Method (DEM) and coupled CFD-DEM simulations, supporting both CPU and GPU architectures.

tools.name: pressio-rom
tools.one_line_profile: Library for reduced order models and solvers
tools.detailed_description: pressio-rom is a library providing linear and non-linear solvers, time integration schemes, and infrastructure for building Reduced Order Models (ROMs) in scientific computing.

tools.name: FluidX3D
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance Lattice Boltzmann CFD software
tools.detailed_description: FluidX3D is a highly optimized Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) CFD software that runs on GPUs and CPUs via OpenCL, known for its speed and memory efficiency.

tools.name: PyFR
tools.one_line_profile: Flux Reconstruction based CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: PyFR is an open-source Python based framework for solving advection-diffusion type problems on streaming architectures using the Flux Reconstruction approach of Huynh.

tools.name: rocm-spack-pkgs
tools.one_line_profile: Spack recipes for ROCm software stack
tools.detailed_description: This repository hosts Spack package recipes for the ROCm (Radeon Open Compute) platform, enabling the deployment of AMD's HPC software stack via the Spack package manager.

tools.name: Neurodocker
tools.one_line_profile: Container generator for reproducible neuroimaging and scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool to generate custom Docker and Singularity/Apptainer recipes and images for neuroimaging and scientific research, ensuring reproducibility by minimizing container size and managing dependencies.

tools.name: Spackenv
tools.one_line_profile: Environment management wrapper for Spack on HPC clusters
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by SJTU HPC to manage and switch between Spack environments for system administrators, users, and developers, facilitating software stack management on high-performance computing clusters.

tools.name: SciBlend
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific data visualization workflow within Blender
tools.detailed_description: A framework for creating advanced scientific data visualizations directly within Blender, enabling researchers to render high-quality 3D representations of simulation and experimental data.

tools.name: SedFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Two-phase flow solver for sediment transport in OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A specialized solver for the OpenFOAM toolbox designed to simulate two-phase flow and sediment transport, widely used in geophysical and engineering fluid dynamics.

tools.name: RapidCFD
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated fork of OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A fork of OpenFOAM designed to run fully on CUDA platforms, enabling significant acceleration of Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) simulations using NVIDIA GPUs.

tools.name: SmartFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Deep reinforcement learning framework for CFD on HPC
tools.detailed_description: A CFD-solver-agnostic deep reinforcement learning framework designed for high-performance computing platforms, facilitating the application of AI control and optimization in fluid dynamics simulations.

tools.name: Tramonto
tools.one_line_profile: DFT-based software for modeling nanostructured fluids
tools.detailed_description: A software package from Sandia National Laboratories for modeling nanostructured fluids using Density Functional Theories (DFT) and Trilinos solvers, applicable to materials science and chemical physics.

tools.name: E4S Recipes
tools.one_line_profile: Spack environments and container recipes for E4S
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Spack environment configurations and container recipes for the Extreme-scale Scientific Software Stack (E4S), facilitating the deployment of scientific software on HPC systems.

tools.name: IonSolver
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated magnetohydrodynamic (MHD) solver
tools.detailed_description: A magnetohydrodynamic simulation software featuring an extended Lattice Boltzmann method and GPU acceleration, written in Rust for high-performance plasma and fluid simulation.

tools.name: WENOEXT
tools.one_line_profile: WENO schemes library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Weighted Essentially Non-Oscillatory (WENO) schemes for the OpenFOAM framework, enhancing the accuracy of shock-capturing in compressible flow simulations.

tools.name: pyFrame3DD
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for Frame3DD structural analysis
tools.detailed_description: Python bindings for Frame3DD, a static and dynamic structural analysis tool for 2D and 3D frames and trusses, maintained as part of the WISDEM (Wind Plant Integrated System Design and Engineering Model) project.

tools.name: XFluids
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-architecture heterogeneous CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: A unified cross-architecture heterogeneous CFD solver designed to run efficiently on various hardware platforms, supporting advanced fluid dynamics simulations.

tools.name: Lattice-Boltzmann-Method-GPU
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance GPU LBM solver
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-accelerated 3D Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) CFD solver developed at Imperial College, offering significant speedups over CPU serial codes for single-phase flow simulations.

tools.name: NekIBM
tools.one_line_profile: Immersed Boundary Method platform based on Nek5000
tools.detailed_description: A multiphase flow simulation platform utilizing the Direct-forced Immersed Boundary Method, built upon the spectral element solver Nek5000 for high-fidelity fluid simulations.

tools.name: AI-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Portable AI workflows for benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A collection of portable, real-world AI workflows developed by the Alan Turing Institute for testing and benchmarking AI infrastructure and scientific applications.

tools.name: PyFRAP
tools.one_line_profile: FRAP analysis toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based toolbox for the analysis of Fluorescence Recovery After Photobleaching (FRAP) data, used to estimate diffusion coefficients and binding kinetics in biophysics.

tools.name: Alsvinn
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Finite Volume simulator with UQ support
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance Finite Volume simulator designed for solving conservation laws with built-in support for Uncertainty Quantification (UQ), utilizing GPU acceleration.

tools.name: Apptainer
tools.one_line_profile: Application container system for HPC (formerly Singularity)
tools.detailed_description: The open-source container system for High-Performance Computing (HPC), formerly known as Singularity, designed to execute applications at bare-metal performance while maintaining security and reproducibility.

tools.name: Apptheus
tools.one_line_profile: Prometheus metrics agent for Apptainer
tools.detailed_description: A monitoring agent that exposes Apptainer container metrics to Prometheus, enabling observability of containerized workloads in HPC environments.

tools.name: Singularity
tools.one_line_profile: Legacy repository for Singularity containers
tools.detailed_description: The historical repository for Singularity (now Apptainer), widely used for scientific containers in HPC. This repo serves as a snapshot before the project moved to the Linux Foundation.

tools.name: tbslas
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel semi-Lagrangian advection-diffusion solver
tools.detailed_description: A parallel, fast solver for scalar advection-diffusion and incompressible Navier-Stokes equations based on semi-Lagrangian and Volume-Integral methods, designed for high-performance simulation.

tools.name: PythonFOAM
tools.one_line_profile: In-situ analysis and ML coupling for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library developed by Argonne National Laboratory to enable in-situ data analysis and machine learning integration directly within OpenFOAM simulations using Python.

tools.name: THAPI-spack
tools.one_line_profile: Spack environment for THAPI tracing tool
tools.detailed_description: A Spack environment configuration for THAPI (Tracing High Performance Applications), facilitating the deployment of tracing and profiling tools on HPC systems.

tools.name: TensorFlowFoam
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow C-API integration for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A framework integrating TensorFlow's C-API into OpenFOAM, enabling the development and deployment of data-driven CFD algorithms and deep learning models within fluid simulations.

tools.name: qc-pyFramework
tools.one_line_profile: ASAM standards quality checker framework
tools.detailed_description: A quality checker framework developed by ASAM e.V. to validate file and implementation conformity against ASAM automotive and engineering standards.

tools.name: AmgXWrapper
tools.one_line_profile: Interface between PETSc and NVIDIA AmgX library for GPU acceleration
tools.detailed_description: A middleware library that allows PETSc-based scientific applications to utilize NVIDIA's AmgX library for solving linear systems on GPUs.

tools.name: PetIBM
tools.one_line_profile: Immersed-boundary method solver for distributed-memory architectures
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox and application suite for solving the Navier-Stokes equations using the immersed-boundary method, designed for high-performance computing clusters.

tools.name: apptainer-conda
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for managing local Conda environments within Apptainer containers
tools.detailed_description: A utility to facilitate the creation and usage of Conda environments inside Apptainer (Singularity) containers, streamlining scientific workflows on HPC systems.

tools.name: pyfrost
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for Bifrost's compacted colored de Bruijn Graph
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface for the Bifrost library, enabling construction and analysis of compacted colored de Bruijn graphs for genomic data.

tools.name: TRUST
tools.one_line_profile: Thermohydraulic software package for CFD simulations
tools.detailed_description: An open-source CFD software designed for incompressible single-phase and low Mach number flows, with extending capabilities for compressible multi-phase flows and GPU acceleration.

tools.name: CEASIOMpy
tools.one_line_profile: Conceptual aircraft design environment
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based environment for conceptual aircraft design, integrating various tools for aerodynamics, structure, and stability analysis.

tools.name: GMSH-Airfoil-2D
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to generate 2D meshes around airfoils
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility that automates the generation of 2D meshes around airfoils using the GMSH mesh generator.

tools.name: PFEMFort
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel programming framework for Finite Element Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A framework for developing parallel Finite Element Analysis (FEA) applications using Fortran and PETSc.

tools.name: PyClaw
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to Clawpack and SharpClaw algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based interface for the Clawpack library, providing solvers for hyperbolic partial differential equations with support for parallel execution via PETSc (PetClaw).

tools.name: CompareM2
tools.one_line_profile: Microbial genomes-to-report pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for comparative genomics of microbial organisms, generating reports from genomic data.

tools.name: mrs_apptainer
tools.one_line_profile: Apptainer wrappers and resources for MRS UAV System
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Apptainer definitions and wrapper scripts to deploy and run the MRS UAV System for robotics research and simulation.

tools.name: PetIGA
tools.one_line_profile: PETSc-based framework for isogeometric analysis
tools.detailed_description: A framework built on top of PETSc for solving Partial Differential Equations using Isogeometric Analysis (IGA) methods.

tools.name: classy_blocks
tools.one_line_profile: Python classes for OpenFOAM blockMesh generation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that simplifies the creation of blockMesh dictionaries for OpenFOAM, allowing for programmatic mesh generation.

tools.name: channel
tools.one_line_profile: DNS solver for turbulent channel flow
tools.detailed_description: A Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) code for incompressible turbulent channel flow, featuring two-dimensional parallelization.

tools.name: usv_sim_lsa
tools.one_line_profile: Unmanned Surface Vehicle simulation on Gazebo
tools.detailed_description: A simulation package for Unmanned Surface Vehicles (USV) using the Gazebo physics simulator, including environmental factors like water currents and winds.

tools.name: pymech
tools.one_line_profile: Python software suite for Nek5000 and SIMSON
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for interacting with data and files from the Nek5000 and SIMSON CFD codes, facilitating post-processing and data management.

tools.name: MaximumSize_on_TopOpt_in_PETSc
tools.one_line_profile: Maximum Size constraints implementation for Topology Optimization in PETSc
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of maximum size constraints within a topology optimization framework based on PETSc, useful for structural optimization.

tools.name: ENRICO
tools.one_line_profile: Exascale Nuclear Reactor Investigative Code for coupled neutronics and thermal-hydraulics
tools.detailed_description: ENRICO is a driver for performing coupled neutronics and thermal-hydraulics simulations on exascale architectures, supporting Nek5000 and OpenMC.

tools.name: ERF
tools.one_line_profile: Energy Research and Forecasting Model for atmospheric simulation
tools.detailed_description: ERF is a compressible Navier-Stokes solver built on the AMReX framework, designed for atmospheric modeling and energy research.

tools.name: OneFLOW
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale multiphysics scientific simulation environment
tools.detailed_description: OneFLOW is a CFD solver designed for large-scale multiphysics simulations, supporting various fluid dynamics problems.

tools.name: NeoN
tools.one_line_profile: Modern CFD core prototype for high-order methods
tools.detailed_description: NeoN is a work-in-progress prototype for a modern Computational Fluid Dynamics core, focusing on high-order numerical methods.

tools.name: dolfiny
tools.one_line_profile: High-level wrappers for DOLFINx (FEniCS)
tools.detailed_description: dolfiny provides high-level convenience wrappers and utilities for DOLFINx, facilitating finite element simulations within the FEniCS ecosystem.

tools.name: SkellySim
tools.one_line_profile: Hydrodynamic Cytoskeleton Simulator for bio-fluids
tools.detailed_description: SkellySim is a simulation tool for hydrodynamic cytoskeletal systems, modeling the interaction of flexible fibers and fluids.

tools.name: relexi
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning framework for CFD on HPC
tools.detailed_description: Relexi is a scalable framework designed to apply reinforcement learning algorithms to Computational Fluid Dynamics problems on High-Performance Computing systems.

tools.name: fluidfoam
tools.one_line_profile: Python postprocessing tool for OpenFOAM data
tools.detailed_description: fluidfoam is a Python library for reading and post-processing OpenFOAM simulation data, enabling analysis and visualization within Python environments.

tools.name: fluidsim
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for fluid dynamics simulations in Python
tools.detailed_description: fluidsim is an extensible framework for studying fluid dynamics via numerical simulations, providing a Pythonic interface for defining and running solvers.

tools.name: rheoTool
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for viscoelastic fluid flow simulation in OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: rheoTool is a toolbox developed on top of OpenFOAM to simulate Generalized Newtonian and viscoelastic fluid flows.

tools.name: foamlib
tools.one_line_profile: Modern Python interface for interacting with OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: foamlib provides a Pythonic interface to interact with OpenFOAM cases, facilitating automation, configuration, and execution of CFD simulations.

tools.name: MANDYOC
tools.one_line_profile: Finite element code for mantle convection simulation
tools.detailed_description: MANDYOC is a finite element code built on PETSc to simulate thermo-chemical convection of the Earth's mantle.

tools.name: Palabos
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Lattice Boltzmann Solver
tools.detailed_description: Palabos is an open-source library and framework for computational fluid dynamics based on the Lattice Boltzmann method.

tools.name: OpenSayal
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time GPU accelerated fluid simulator
tools.detailed_description: OpenSayal is a fluid simulation tool leveraging GPU acceleration for real-time performance.

tools.name: GridapPETSc.jl
tools.one_line_profile: PETSc solvers interface for Gridap.jl
tools.detailed_description: GridapPETSc.jl provides an interface to use PETSc scalable solvers within the Gridap Julia finite element framework.

tools.name: CUDA-LBM-simulator
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated Lattice-Boltzmann simulator
tools.detailed_description: A Lattice-Boltzmann fluid simulation implementation optimized for CUDA GPUs.

tools.name: HPDDM
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance domain decomposition methods framework
tools.detailed_description: HPDDM is a framework providing high-performance implementations of domain decomposition methods for solving large-scale linear systems.

tools.name: hyStrath
tools.one_line_profile: Hypersonic and rarefied gas dynamics simulation code
tools.detailed_description: hyStrath is a simulation code developed for hypersonic flows and rarefied gas dynamics.

tools.name: PFC3D_OpenFOAM
tools.one_line_profile: Coupling interface for PFC3D and OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: This tool enables fluid-particle interaction modeling by coupling PFC3D (Particle Flow Code) with OpenFOAM.

tools.name: petsc4foam
tools.one_line_profile: PETSc linear solvers for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: petsc4foam integrates PETSc's high-performance linear solvers into the OpenFOAM framework to accelerate simulations.

tools.name: CfdOF
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM CFD workbench for FreeCAD
tools.detailed_description: CfdOF is a FreeCAD workbench that provides a GUI and workflow for setting up and running OpenFOAM CFD simulations directly within FreeCAD.

tools.name: MPLBM-UT
tools.one_line_profile: Multiphase Lattice Boltzmann Method library for porous media
tools.detailed_description: MPLBM-UT is a library for performing multiphase simulations based on the Shan-Chen model, specifically designed for complicated geometries like porous media.

tools.name: GustGrid
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time CUDA-powered airflow and thermal simulation tool
tools.detailed_description: A C++/OpenGL tool utilizing CUDA for real-time simulation of airflow and thermal dynamics in PC cases, enabling interactive visualization of fluid dynamics.

tools.name: cfd-bwb-airfoil-optimizer
tools.one_line_profile: Airfoil optimization workflow using SU2 and OpenMDAO
tools.detailed_description: An optimization framework for Blended Wing Body (BWB) airfoils, integrating the SU2 CFD solver with OpenMDAO for design optimization.

tools.name: apptainer-in-docker
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to run Apptainer (HPC containers) inside Docker
tools.detailed_description: A specialized infrastructure tool enabling the use of Apptainer (formerly Singularity), the standard HPC container runtime, within Docker environments, facilitating CI/CD for scientific workflows.

tools.name: openInjMoldSim
tools.one_line_profile: Open source injection molding simulation solver for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A specialized solver based on OpenFOAM for simulating the injection molding process, addressing manufacturing and fluid dynamics problems.

tools.name: pyFRF
tools.one_line_profile: Frequency Response Function library for structural dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for calculating and analyzing Frequency Response Functions (FRF), commonly used in structural dynamics and vibration analysis.

tools.name: butterfly
tools.one_line_profile: Python API for creating and running OpenFOAM cases
tools.detailed_description: A library that allows users to create, run, and manage OpenFOAM CFD simulations directly from Python, often used in conjunction with parametric design tools.

tools.name: MF-LBM
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance Lattice Boltzmann Code for porous media flow
tools.detailed_description: A portable and scalable Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) solver developed by LANL for Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) of flow in porous media.

tools.name: Peridigm
tools.one_line_profile: Massively-parallel computational peridynamics code
tools.detailed_description: An open-source computational peridynamics code developed at Sandia National Laboratories for multi-physics simulations of material failure, built on Trilinos.

tools.name: CFDBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for machine learning methods in fluid dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale benchmark suite designed to evaluate and compare machine learning methods applied to fluid dynamics problems.

tools.name: madupite
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed Solver for Large-Scale Markov Decision Processes
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance distributed solver for large-scale Markov Decision Processes (MDP) utilizing inexact policy iteration, applicable in operations research and control theory.

tools.name: pi-BEM
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Boundary Element Method solver
tools.detailed_description: A parallel implementation of the Boundary Element Method (BEM) for solving partial differential equations, developed by SISSA mathLab.

tools.name: DAFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Discrete Adjoint with OpenFOAM for Multidisciplinary Design Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A high-fidelity Multidisciplinary Design Optimization (MDO) tool that implements the discrete adjoint method within the OpenFOAM framework.

tools.name: Syndeo
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to run Ray jobs on SLURM with Apptainer
tools.detailed_description: A workflow orchestration tool from MIT Lincoln Laboratory that enables running massively parallel Ray jobs on SLURM clusters using secure Apptainer containers.

tools.name: aither
tools.one_line_profile: 3D block-structured Navier-Stokes solver
tools.detailed_description: A computational fluid dynamics solver for the Navier-Stokes equations, featuring 3D block-structured grids and explicit/implicit time stepping.

tools.name: PETSc-FEM
tools.one_line_profile: General purpose parallel multi-physics finite element solver
tools.detailed_description: A general purpose, parallel, multi-physics finite element program developed at CIMEC, built on top of PETSc libraries for solving partial differential equations.

tools.name: SOLVERLAB
tools.one_line_profile: PDE solver environment using SALOME/MEDCoupling and PETSc
tools.detailed_description: A PDE solver laboratory that integrates SALOME/MEDCoupling for meshing and PETSc for matrix computations, designed for developing and testing numerical solvers.

tools.name: nekStab
tools.one_line_profile: Global linear stability analysis toolbox for Nek5000
tools.detailed_description: An open source toolbox based on Krylov methods for performing highly parallel global linear stability analysis of incompressible flow problems within the Nek5000 CFD framework.

tools.name: BARAM
tools.one_line_profile: User-friendly CFD software package based on OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive CFD software package designed to be accessible ('CFD for Everyone'), providing a GUI and workflow management for OpenFOAM-based simulations.

tools.name: freeCappuccino
tools.one_line_profile: 3D unstructured finite volume CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: A three-dimensional unstructured finite volume code designed for fluid flow simulations, supporting various mesh types and flow conditions.

tools.name: Phase
tools.one_line_profile: Unstructured 2D multiphase solver with immersed boundary methods
tools.detailed_description: A solver for unstructured 2D multiphase flows utilizing immersed boundary methods, designed for simulating complex fluid interfaces.

tools.name: petsc-hs
tools.one_line_profile: Haskell bindings for PETSc and SLEPc
tools.detailed_description: Provides Haskell bindings for the PETSc and SLEPc scientific computing libraries, enabling high-performance linear algebra and PDE solving within the Haskell ecosystem.

tools.name: pyFreeFem
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for FreeFem++
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper library for FreeFem++, allowing users to interface with the FreeFem++ finite element solver using Python scripts.

tools.name: OpenMPS
tools.one_line_profile: Moving Particle Semi-implicit (MPS) method implementation
tools.detailed_description: An open source implementation of the Moving Particle Semi-implicit (MPS) method, a meshless method for simulating free-surface fluid flows.

tools.name: DOT
tools.one_line_profile: Decomposed Optimization Time Integration for deformation dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A domain-decomposed optimization method (DOT) for fast and reliable simulation of deformation dynamics, enabling efficient convergence in extreme conditions.

tools.name: PERMON
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel quadratic programming solver package
tools.detailed_description: A main package for quadratic programming (PermonQP) within the PERMON toolbox, providing parallel, scalable numerical solvers often used in contact mechanics and SVMs.

tools.name: PETSc
tools.one_line_profile: Portable Extensible Toolkit for Scientific Computation
tools.detailed_description: A suite of data structures and routines for the scalable (parallel) solution of scientific applications modeled by partial differential equations, widely used in CFD and physics simulations.

tools.name: porousMultiphaseFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Porous multiphase flow toolbox for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM toolbox dedicated to the simulation of multiphase flow and transport in porous media.

tools.name: PISM
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Ice Sheet Model
tools.detailed_description: An open source, parallel, high-resolution ice sheet model designed for simulating the dynamics of ice sheets and glaciers.

tools.name: ramsesGPU
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-optimized Astrophysics MHD simulation code
tools.detailed_description: A version of the RAMSES astrophysics Magnetohydrodynamics (MHD) simulation code optimized for large clusters of GPUs.

tools.name: CreateFFD
tools.one_line_profile: Free-Form Deformation box generator for SU2
tools.detailed_description: A utility to generate Free-Form Deformation (FFD) boxes for the SU2 CFD solver, facilitating shape optimization workflows.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-preCICE Adapter
tools.one_line_profile: Adapter for coupling OpenFOAM with preCICE
tools.detailed_description: An adapter that allows OpenFOAM to be coupled with other solvers for multi-physics simulations using the preCICE coupling library.

tools.name: preCICE
tools.one_line_profile: Coupling library for partitioned multi-physics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A coupling library and ecosystem for partitioned multi-physics and multi-scale simulations, supporting surface and volume coupling across various solvers.

tools.name: preCICE SU2 Adapter
tools.one_line_profile: Coupling adapter connecting the SU2 CFD solver with the preCICE coupling library
tools.detailed_description: An official adapter that allows the SU2 CFD solver to communicate with the preCICE coupling library, enabling partitioned multi-physics simulations such as fluid-structure interaction (FSI) or conjugate heat transfer (CHT).

tools.name: CFDTool
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB-based CFD simulation toolbox with GUI
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) that provides a GUI and integrated solvers (including OpenFOAM and SU2 interfaces) for modeling fluid flow and heat transfer.

tools.name: FEATool Multiphysics
tools.one_line_profile: Fully integrated physics simulation platform for MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A multi-physics simulation toolbox for MATLAB that integrates FEA, FEniCS, OpenFOAM, and SU2 solvers into a unified GUI environment for modeling coupled physical phenomena.

tools.name: AlphaFold Singularity
tools.one_line_profile: Singularity container definition for deploying AlphaFold on HPC systems
tools.detailed_description: A Singularity/Apptainer recipe designed to build and deploy the AlphaFold protein structure prediction system in High Performance Computing (HPC) environments where Docker is not available.

tools.name: CfdOF
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) workbench for FreeCAD
tools.detailed_description: A FreeCAD workbench that integrates OpenFOAM and FEniCS solvers, allowing users to perform CFD simulations directly within the FreeCAD parametric 3D modeling environment.

tools.name: Quokka
tools.one_line_profile: Two-moment AMR radiation hydrodynamics solver for astrophysics
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance radiation hydrodynamics code with adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) that runs on CPUs and GPUs, designed for astrophysical simulations involving self-gravity, particles, and magnetic fields.

tools.name: EBGeometry
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for embedded boundary (EB) geometry generation
tools.detailed_description: A package for generating embedded boundary geometries, useful for setting up complex domains in CFD and PDE simulations.

tools.name: PolyMPS
tools.one_line_profile: Moving Particle Semi-implicit (MPS) method solver
tools.detailed_description: A C++/OpenMP implementation of the Moving Particle Semi-implicit (MPS) method for simulating free-surface fluid flows with polygon or particle walls.

tools.name: Sailfish
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) simulation package
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) solver based on the Lattice Boltzmann Method, optimized for GPUs using CUDA and OpenCL.

tools.name: Spack Manager
tools.one_line_profile: Management tool for Spack-based project and machine deployments
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by Sandia National Laboratories to manage complex Spack environments, facilitating the deployment of scientific software stacks on HPC machines.

tools.name: P3DFFT++
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel 3D Fast Fourier Transform library for multiscale simulations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for performing parallel 3D FFTs, designed as a framework for simulating multiscale phenomena in HPC environments, supporting 1D/2D/3D domain decomposition.

tools.name: REMORA
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-enabled version of the Regional Ocean Modeling System (ROMS)
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-accelerated implementation of the ROMS ocean model, developed under the SciDAC project to enable high-performance oceanographic simulations.

tools.name: Wave CLI
tools.one_line_profile: CLI tool for provisioning containers in scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: The command-line interface for the Wave container service, used within the Nextflow ecosystem to provision and manage containers for reproducible scientific data pipelines.

tools.name: OpenHyperFLOW2D
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel CFD code for 2D compressible viscous flows
tools.detailed_description: A research and educational CFD code supporting MPI, OpenMP, and CUDA for simulating transient viscous compressible flows with RANS/URANS turbulence models.

tools.name: cudaParticlesFoam
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated particle tracking library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library that offloads Lagrangian particle tracking calculations to the GPU within the OpenFOAM CFD framework, accelerating multiphase flow simulations.

tools.name: docker2singularity
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to convert Docker images to Singularity/Apptainer format
tools.detailed_description: A utility that facilitates the conversion of Docker container images into Singularity images, enabling the use of Docker-based scientific tools in HPC environments where Singularity is the standard.

tools.name: snek5000
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for the Nek5000 CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: A Pythonic interface and workflow manager for Nek5000, a spectral element method CFD solver, simplifying simulation setup, execution, and post-processing.

tools.name: Alamo
tools.one_line_profile: Solid mechanics solver with Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR)
tools.detailed_description: A C++ code providing explicit and implicit solvers for solid mechanics problems, utilizing adaptive mesh refinement to handle multiscale features efficiently.

tools.name: Spack
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible package manager for HPC software
tools.detailed_description: A multi-platform package manager designed for high-performance computing (HPC) that supports multiple versions, configurations, platforms, and compilers, essential for managing scientific software stacks.

tools.name: SPECTER
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral element PDE solver for Navier-Stokes equations
tools.detailed_description: A PDE solver focused on Navier-Stokes and related equations with arbitrary boundary conditions, employing Fourier (FC-Gram) expansions and parallelized using MPI-OpenMP-CUDA.

tools.name: SU2 MeshTools
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh manipulation tools for the SU2 CFD suite
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for generating and manipulating computational meshes specifically designed for the SU2 multiphysics simulation suite.

tools.name: SU2
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source suite for multiphysics simulation and design
tools.detailed_description: SU2 is an open-source suite for multiphysics simulation and design, featuring flow analysis and design optimization capabilities for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) on unstructured meshes.

tools.name: TopOpt in PETSc Python
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for PETSc-based topology optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper and extended functionality for topology optimization using PETSc, enabling efficient large-scale optimization on Cartesian grids.

tools.name: TopOpt in PETSc
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable topology optimization using PETSc
tools.detailed_description: Topology optimization framework for linear elastic minimum compliance problems with volume constraints on 3D Cartesian grids, leveraging the PETSc library for scalability.

tools.name: TopOpt in PETSc Transient
tools.one_line_profile: Transient topology optimization using PETSc
tools.detailed_description: Extension of the TopOpt in PETSc framework to handle time-dependent linear elastic problems on 3D Cartesian grids.

tools.name: ForTrilinos
tools.one_line_profile: Fortran interfaces for Trilinos packages
tools.detailed_description: Provides portable object-oriented Fortran interfaces to Trilinos C++ packages, enabling Fortran-based scientific applications to leverage Trilinos solvers and tools.

tools.name: Trilinos
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithms and technologies for complex scientific problems
tools.detailed_description: A collection of open-source software libraries intended to be used as building blocks for the development of scientific applications, focusing on linear algebra, solvers, and discretization.

tools.name: JAXFLUIDS
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable fluid dynamics package using JAX
tools.detailed_description: A fully differentiable fluid dynamics package written in Python using JAX, enabling machine learning integration and gradient-based optimization for fluid problems.

tools.name: turbinesFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Actuator line modeling library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An extension library for OpenFOAM that implements actuator line modeling for simulating wind and hydrokinetic turbines.

tools.name: Underworld2
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel particle-in-cell finite element geodynamics code
tools.detailed_description: A parallel, particle-in-cell, finite element code designed for large-scale geodynamics simulations and modelling of crustal and mantle dynamics.

tools.name: hybridCentralSolvers
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid central scheme solvers for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A collection of hybrid central solvers for OpenFOAM, including one-phase, two-phase, and multicomponent versions for compressible flow simulations.

tools.name: libAcoustics
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM library for far-field noise computation
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM library for computing far-field noise using acoustic analogies (e.g., Curle, Ffowcs Williams-Hawkings).

tools.name: DRLinFluids
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Reinforcement Learning coupled with OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python platform for coupling deep reinforcement learning (DRL) algorithms with OpenFOAM for flow control and optimization problems.

tools.name: Waiwera
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel geothermal flow simulator
tools.detailed_description: A parallel, open-source simulator for geothermal flow and heat transport in porous media, designed for high-performance computing environments.

tools.name: TopADD
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel topology optimization framework using PETSc
tools.detailed_description: A 2D/3D integrated topology optimization parallel-computing framework designed for arbitrary design domains, leveraging PETSc for high-performance computing.

tools.name: X3D2
tools.one_line_profile: Next-generation high-fidelity CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: A high-order finite-difference flow solver designed for high-fidelity computational fluid dynamics simulations, serving as the next-generation iteration of XCompact3d.

tools.name: ofpp
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM Python Parser for data conversion
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to parse OpenFOAM output files and convert field data directly into Numpy arrays for efficient post-processing and analysis.

tools.name: navier_stokes_multigrid
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Navier-Stokes solver with parallel multigrid
tools.detailed_description: A CFD solver for the 3D Navier-Stokes equations implementing a pressure-correction scheme and parallel multigrid V-cycle for efficient computation.

tools.name: turbulent-cfd
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated turbulent CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: A computational fluid dynamics solver for turbulent flows, leveraging CUDA and Vulkan for hardware acceleration on CPUs and GPUs.

tools.name: dugksFoam
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM solver for Discrete Unified Gas Kinetic Scheme
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM-based solver implementing the Discrete Unified Gas Kinetic Scheme (DUGKS) for simulating multiscale flow problems governed by the Boltzmann model equation.
